sentences.sContent: One day I'll want to settle down and have a family.
sentences.sCn: 总有一天我会想安顿下来，成个家。

sentences.sContent: It'd be fun, after the situation in Europe settles down, to take a trip to France.
sentences.sCn: 欧洲局势平定下来之后，去法国旅行将会很好玩。

sentences.sContent: He got his coffee, came back and settled down to listen.
sentences.sCn: 他取了咖啡回来安心听了起来。

trans.tranOther: When someone settles down, they start living a quiet life in one place, especially when they get married or buy a house
